topic: How do mobile devices support language learning?
summary:
[SYNTHESIZER] Integrate findings and critiques into coherent hypotheses. Provide rationale and map citations to each hypothesis.

[READER] Identify core methods, datasets, and principal findings. Provide concise bullet points; avoid speculation. When available, refer

Follow-up Research Directions:
